## 

```{r}
mm <- model.matrix(~PatientID+TissueSubtype, data = cd)
colnames(mm)[1] <- levels(cd$TissueSubtype)[1]
colnames(mm) <- gsub("TissueSubtype|PatientID", "", colnames(mm))
```
